updates.title: Initial Loader Release
updates.description: Released Replix Loader v1.0 with basic authentication, product injection, and basic FiveM compatibility.

updates.title: Visual ESP Added
updates.description: Added player ESP with box, skeleton, name, health bar, and distance display.

updates.title: Aimbot v1 Implemented
updates.description: Introduced basic aimbot with FOV circle, toggle hotkey, and target prioritization (head/nearest).

updates.title: Silent Aim Beta
updates.description: Implemented silent aim with prediction and smoothness options (may desync on high ping).

updates.title: Noclip + Fly Mode
updates.description: Enabled noclip and with speed adjustment and collision bypass.

updates.title: Vehicle Enhancements
updates.description: Added car fly, infinite nitro, and godmode for vehicles.

updates.title: Triggerbot & Custom Hotkeys
updates.description: Triggerbot feature with configurable delay. Added full keybind customization.

updates.title: Overlay Optimization
updates.description: Improved ESP rendering for lower-end systems. Fixed flickering on some GPUs.

updates.title: Spectator & Admin Detection
updates.description: Added admin check (invisible/ghost) and basic spectator detection alerts.

updates.title: Support for FiveM Build 3323
updates.description: Added compatibility with FiveM game build 3323. Ensures loader and external features run without issues on the latest version.

updates.title: Bugfixes & QoL Improvements
updates.description:
• Fixed healthbar showing incorrect values.
• Improved OBS streamproof functionality — cheats are now fully hidden when enabled.
• Fixed Noclip keybind not registering properly.
• Added optional vehicle repair feature for quick fixes.
• Prevented cheats from being visible after ALT+F4 followed by pressing HOME.

updates.title: Damage Indicators, Save Teleport Locations & Absorption
updates.description: Added visual indicators for damage taken, implemented the ability to save and quickly teleport to custom locations, and introduced absorption functionality to temporarily reduce incoming damage.
